程序包 com.se.aiconomy.server.langchain.common.chain

类 BaseChain

java.lang.Object
com.se.aiconomy.server.langchain.common.chain.BaseChain
直接已知子类:
Chain
public abstract class BaseChain extends Object
Abstract base class for all chain implementations. Provides the basic structure for invoking and streaming chat operations with specific model configurations and request parameters.

  • 方法详细资料

    • invoke

      public abstract String invoke(Locale locale, Map<String,Object> variables)
      Invokes the chain with the specified locale and variables.
      参数:
      locale - the locale to use for the operation
      variables - a map of variables to be used in the chain
      返回:
      the result of the chain invocation as a String

    • stream

      public abstract void stream(Locale locale, Map<String,Object> variables, dev.langchain4j.model.chat.response.StreamingChatResponseHandler responseHandler)
      Streams the chain response with the specified locale and variables.
      参数:
      locale - the locale to use for the operation
      variables - a map of variables to be used in the chain
      responseHandler - the handler for streaming chat responses
